Name: Vodka Espresso
Ingredients: 20 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of float 3 coffee beans in the centre of the drink, arranged in a flower petal formation..
Review: Vodka and coffee combine in this tasty wake-up call.
History: Created circa 1983 by Dick Bradsell while bartending at the Soho Brasserie on Old Compton Street, London who created his Vodka Espresso for a woman, said to be an " American model ," who famously asked for " Something that's gonna wake me up, then fuck me up. "
Nutrition: One serving of Vodka Espresso contains 189 calories
